title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 913.1 - Purpose and authority
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 913.1 - Purpose and authority

State Regulations

This Part establishes and implements the program of
railroad bridge inventory and inspection as directed by Highway Law Article IX, and is applicable to all railroads subject to this statute. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
913.1

Adopted

New

York State Register September 27, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 39, eff. 9/27/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
